docs.snippet: Imperious Sven Kramer smashed the opposition and the Olympic record to successfully defend his 5,000 metres title on Saturday as the Dutch marked the start of the Sochi Games speedskating competition with a rare clean sweep of the medals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Imperious Sven Kramer smashed the opposition and the Olympic record to successfully defend his 5,000 metres title on Saturday as the Dutch marked the start of the Sochi Games speedskating competition with a rare clean sweep of the medals.

docs.snippet: An Eden Hazard hat-trick swept Chelsea back to the top of the Premier League on Saturday as they beat Newcastle United 3-0 at Stamford Bridge after morning leaders Arsenal were thrashed 5-1 at Liverpool....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Eden Hazard hat-trick swept Chelsea back to the top of the Premier League on Saturday as they beat Newcastle United 3-0 at Stamford Bridge after morning leaders Arsenal were thrashed 5-1 at Liverpool.

headline.main: Chelsea Go Top as Arsenal Crushed at Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Go Top as Arsenal Crushed at Liverpool

docs.snippet: Advocates of the practice, who shun the term “assisted suicide,” say they believe that as baby boomers watch frail parents suffer, support for their movement will grow further....
docs.lead_paragraph: Advocates of the practice, who shun the term “assisted suicide,” say they believe that as baby boomers watch frail parents suffer, support for their movement will grow further.
docs.abstract: Public support for the 'aid in dying' movement is growing nationwide, with five states allowing doctors to help terminally ill patients end their lives, but taboo remains in much of country; dilemma is illustrated by case of Robert Mitton, Colorado man with terminal heart disease who has been thwarted in effort to have a dignified death, though he could do so in neighboring state of New Mexico.

headline.main: ‘Aid in Dying’ Movement Takes Hold in Some States
headline.print_headline: ‘Aid in Dying’ Movement Takes Hold in Some States

docs.snippet: Greg Bretz, one of the few snowboarders who has defeated Shaun White in the halfpipe, will ride alone in Sochi. But his father will be there, as he has been all along....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greg Bretz, one of the few snowboarders who has defeated Shaun White in the halfpipe, will ride alone in Sochi. But his father will be there, as he has been all along.
docs.abstract: Profile of Greg Bretz, American snowboarder preparing for Sochi Games who is one of few to have defeated Shaun White in the halfpipe.

headline.main: Father and Son, Together on a Halfpipe Quest
